DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : Men 40 60 year age , good general physical mental health , androgenetic alopecia Exclusion Criteria : History previous bladder surgery , acute urinary retention , urethral stricture , repeat urethral catheterization , repeat urinary tract infection , active urinary tract infection History treatment finasteride ( PROSCAR PROPECIA ) hypersensitivity component finasteride .
